groceries.product: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Baby Spinach, 5 oz
groceries.explanation:
Bag contains 340g. 1 cup florets = 70g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787465/portions)
9.7 servings. $2.49 / 9.7 = 0.25670103093. Assumes eaten raw. Rounded up.

groceries.product: 365 Everyday Value, Broccoli Florets, 12 oz
groceries.explanation:
Bag contains 340g. 1 cup florets = 70g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787465/portions)
9.7 servings. $2.49 / 9.7 = 0.25670103093. Assumes eaten raw. Rounded up.

groceries.product: Tomato Vine Conventional
groceries.explanation:
1 cup = 180g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787683/portions)
180g = .4 lbs. $1.99 * .4 = 0.796. Assumes eaten raw. Rounded up.

groceries.product: Organic Garnet Sweet Potato
365 Everyday Value, Carrot Baby Peeled Bag Organic, 16 Ounce
groceries.explanation:
1 cup chopped = 128g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787522/portions)
3 cups = 384g. Bag is 454g. 384/454 = 0.84581497797. Rounded up. $1.69 * .85 = 1.4365. Rounded up. Assumes eaten raw.

groceries.product: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Black Beans, 15 oz
Conventional Yellow Potato
Corn Bi Color Conventional
groceries.explanation:
1 medium ear = 102 g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787790/portions)
1 cup = 145g (same source). 2 cup = 290, or approx. 3 medium ears.

groceries.product: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Baby Lima Beans, No Salt Added, 16 oz, (Frozen)
groceries.explanation:
Bag contains 3.33 cups (nutrition facts). 1 / 3.33 = 0.3 of package.
$2.69 / .3 = 0.807. Rounded up.

groceries.product: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Trimmed Green Beans, 12 oz
Organic Yellow Onion
groceries.explanation:
1 cup = 160g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/787804/portions)
2 cup = 320g. 320g = 0.7054792 lb. Rounded up. $1.49 * .71 = 1.0579. Rounded up.

groceries.product: Organic Fuji Apple
Strawberry Organic, 16 Ounce
groceries.explanation:
16 oz to grams = 453.5924. Round up to 454. 1 cup = 166g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/786790/portions)
2 cups = 332g. 332/453 = 0.73289183223. $3.99 * .73 = 2.9127

groceries.product: Grape Green Seedless Organic

Black Plum Conventional
groceries.explanation:
1 cup = 165g (https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/786736/portions)
2 cup = 330g. 330g = 0.7275255. Rounded up. $2.49 * .73 = 1.8177. Rounded up.
